CustomField.description: Primary email address for the candidate. Use for communication and enrollment confirmations. May be used to match existing Account/Contact records. This is a key contact method for enrollment follow-up and documentation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the candidate's primary email address (e.g., john.smith@example.com). This email may be used to match existing Account or Contact records and is used for enrollment confirmations.
CustomField.label: Email
